text: Traffic Management 12123 Privacy Policy
Release date: June 30, 2021
Effective date: June 30, 2021

"Traffic Management 12123" is the official client of the Internet Transportation Safety Comprehensive Service Management Platform provided by the Institute of Traffic Management Sciences (hereinafter referred to as "us").

We attach great importance to your personal information and privacy protection, and will protect your personal information and privacy security in accordance with the requirements of laws and regulations.

Through this "Privacy Policy", we will explain to you how we collect and use your relevant personal information, and to provide you with relevant measures that provide you with access, correction, delete and protect these information in order to better protect your rights and interests.
This policy will help you understand the following:
How do we collect and use personal information
How do we use cookie equal similar technologies
Fingerprint/Face Data Related
How do we share, transfer, and publicly disclose personal information
How do we store and protect personal information
How do we manage personal information
Third -party service
age limit
Notice and revision
contact us
[Special Tips] Please read and fully understand this "Privacy Policy" before using the services we provided, especially the terms of the thick body logo and make appropriate choices.
When you use or continue to use our services, you agree that you agree that we will process your relevant information in accordance with this privacy policy.
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: When you use or continue to use our services, you agree that you agree with this privacy policy.

text: 1. How do we collect and use personal information
You may need to provide your personal information in the process of using the traffic management 12123 business.

This is not required to provide us with personal information, but in some cases, we need to collect some of your information to help you become our users, provide you with good services, optimize your user experience, and provide security guarantee.
(1) We collect and obtain your information through the following channels:
label: First Party Collection Information

text: 1.When you are registered with the 12123 user account, we will collect your certificate type, identity certificate, name, mobile phone number, registered provincial and cities, and log in to the password.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When you are registered with the 12123 user account, you collect your certificate type, identity certificate, name, mobile phone number, registered province and city, login password.

text: Collecting this information is to help you create an account. If you refuse to provide this information, it will affect your registration.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: Collect your information to register your account.

text: During the registration process, we will provide real -person certification to you and obtain your avatar photo information to confirm that the registration information is associated with you.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: During the registration process, obtain your avatar photo information for practical authentication.

text: 2.During the process of handling the motor vehicle business, the relevant individual and vehicle information needed by the collection business.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: During the process of handling the motor vehicle business, the relevant information such as vehicle information, car purchase invoices, vehicle insurance, and mailing address required by collecting business are collected.

text: Such as applying for motor vehicle filing, pre -selected motor vehicle number plates, inspection and reservation, replacement of receivables, replacement of the launch license, motor vehicle suspension application, application for inspection exemption signs, and mobile vehicle transfer applicationInformation, car purchase invoice, vehicle insurance, mailing address and other related information.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: 3.During the driver's license business, the relevant personal information required by the business office is collected.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: During the driving license business process, the personal photos, contact information, and mailing address of the collection business need to collect the business office.

text: Such as applying for examination appointments, examination fees, payment of driving -increasing driving, replacement of driving licenses, extension of the driver's license, submitting driving license photo, driving license application application, driving license examination business and other services, you need to provide you with an individualPhotos, contact information, mailing address and other related information.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: 4.In the process of road traffic accidents, you need to collect relevant business information such as the identity information of you and the other party's driving license, motor vehicle information, and the photos of the accident.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: In the process of road traffic accidents, you need to collect relevant business information such as the identity information of you and the other party's driving license, motor vehicle information, and the photos of the accident.

text: 5.In the process of handling full score examination, you need to collect your studies photos to confirm that you participate in online learning.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: In the process of handling full score examination, you need to collect your studies.

text: 6.According to business needs, other businesses need to collect your relevant personal information.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: (2) Information collected by third parties
1.Equipment and application information.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: Equipment resolution, package name, equipment settings, process and software list, unique device identifier, software and hardware feature information), and the location related information of the device.

Important
rewrite: According to the specific permissions granted in the software installation and use, receive and record the relevant information and the relevant information of the equipment you use.

text: 2.Log information.
When you handle our business, we may automatically collect the detailed usage in your operation and save it as a network log.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When you handle our business, collect the detailed usage in your operation and save it as a network log.

text: 3.location information.
When you handle accidents, one -click on the service, the map service provider will collect your current location information to determine the specific location of the business.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When you handle accidents, one -click on the service, the map service provider will collect your current location information.

text: 4.Message push service.

If you use some mobile phone manufacturers (such as Xiaomi, Huawei, VIVO, OPPO and other brands), mobile phone use traffic management 12123, the above -mentioned mobile phone manufacturer Push, SDK we needParameters such as mobile phone models, system types, system versions, device screen size, system installation application information are used to achieve push for our product information. For specific situations, please see the privacy policy or related statement of the SDK operator.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Mobile phone manufacturers Push SDK needs to collect parameters such as mobile phone models, system types, system versions, device screen size, system installation application information, and other parameters to achieve information push.

text: 5.Real certification service.

When registering and updating the validity period of ID cards, not my own motor vehicle, user information appeal, full -scale examination education, and processing that requires face -to -face signing, we will collect your solid avatar photos, together with personal names, identity certification numbers, ID card validity period validity periodFor information, submit a credit identity certification platform for the Ministry of Public Security to determine your authenticity.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When registering and renewing the validity period of ID cards, not your own motor vehicle, user information appeal, full -scale examination education, and processing required for face -to -face signing, collect your real person's avatar photos, along with personal names, identity certification numbers, ID card validity period and other information, To verify the identity.

text: 6.Third party payment.

When you apply for examination fees, license certificates, and transportation fines for traffic violations, the third -party online payment platforms built on their own need to provide the required payment information.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When applying for examination fees, license certificates, and transportation of traffic violations, the third -party online payment platform needs to collect payment information.

text: 7.Safety control.

Time to update time, Ro.Boot.Bootloader, IMEI, mobile phone MAC address, Androidid, number of power supply, whether SIM card, instruction architecture, screen width, network connection type, USB debugging mode, gravity sensing detection, power acquisition, charging status, charging statusThe application information installed by the system is uploaded to the server to ensure your account security.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When you use the APP service, you need to collect your mobile phone device information encryption and upload to the server to ensure your account security.

First Party Collection Information

Data Security

Data Security

text: Before deciding whether to use such services, please fully understand his personal information and privacy protection strategies from third -party service providers, or contact your business users to learn more information.
(3) Security security service

In order to improve the security of your service with our and partners, protect your personal and property security for exemption, better prevent security risks such as fishing websites, fraud, network vulnerabilities, computer viruses, cyber attacks, and network invasion.Land identification that violates laws and regulations or the relevant agreement rules of the traffic management 12123, we may collect, use, or integrate your account information, equipment information, log information, and our related units and partners to obtain information that you authorize or shared in accordance with laws, come to come, come to come.Comprehensively judge your account risk, verify, test and prevent security incidents, and take necessary analysis and disposal measures in accordance with the law.

First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collect, use, or integrate your account information, equipment information, log information, and information shared by your authorization or sharing according to law for risk prevention, and take necessary analysis and disposal measures.

According to relevant laws and regulations and national standards, collecting and using your personal information in the following situations do not need to obtain your authorization consent:

First Party Collection Information

First Party Collection Information

First Party Collection Information

First Party Collection Information

First Party Collection Information

First Party Collection Information

First Party Collection Information

text: 2. How do we use cookie equivalent technologies

In order to make you a convenient and smooth access experience, when you use the traffic management 12123 and related services, we may be used to identify your identity through the Cookie small data files in your terminal device.Steps of information, or help judge your account security status.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When you use the traffic management 12123 and related services, you may use the cookie small data file to identify your identity.

text: We will not use the information collected above for any purpose outside of the purpose of this privacy policy.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: The information collected by Cookie is not used in any purpose outside the purpose of this privacy policy.

text: Please understand that some of our services can only be implemented by using "cookie".
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Some of our services can only be implemented by using "cookie".

text: Cookie allows us to provide you better and faster.

Of course, you can clear the cookies file file or your browser or browser additional service permit on the mobile phone 12123 mobile phone, and you can set the degree of cookies in the browser, but this move may affect your safe access in some cases.Communications 12123 related websites and services provided by related platforms.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: You can remove the cookie data file on the traffic tube 12123 mobile phone, or set the degree of cookies in the browser.

text: 3. Fingerprint/face data related
(1) In order to conveniently your login operation, we provide fingerprint/face ID fast login function.
1.After the login is successful, you can choose whether to use the fingerprint/face ID of the mobile phone to use the quick login.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: You can choose whether to use your mobile phone's fingerprint/face ID to enable quickly.

text: 2.The fingerprint/facial ID information used by quickly logging in is stored in your mobile phone operating system.
label: Data Retention
Important
rewrite: The fingerprint/facial ID information used by quickly logging in is stored in the mobile phone operating system.

text: We can only verify through the system, and we do not obtain information about fingerprint/face ID, and at the same time we will not upload any fingerprint/face ID information to the server.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We will not obtain information about fingerprint/face ID, and at the same time we will not upload any fingerprint/face ID information to the service end.

text: (2) To effectively identify your true identity and ensure your personal traffic management information security, we will apply for user registration, find passwords, or replace equipment to replace the motor vehicle number plate, driving license, driving license and online learning, etc.In the business, collect your on -site face information for identity authentication.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: In your business registration, retrieve password, or replace the device to replace the motor vehicle number plate, driving license, driver's license and online learning, collect your on -site face information for identity authentication.

text: 1.Before collecting face information, we will prompt in advance and get your consent confirmation.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Before collecting face information, we will prompt in advance and get your consent confirmation.

text: 2.When authentication, we will verify the comparison of the collected resident ID numbers, names, and facial information with the information you reserved.

3.We will protect your information in accordance with industry traffic standards and efforts to adopt reasonable physical, electronics and management security measures, and do our best to make your and your final user's information from being leaked, damaged or lost.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Take security measures to protect your information to avoid your information leakage, damage or loss.

text: 4.We will not share your face information data from any third party.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: We will not share your face information data from any third party.

text: 4. How do we share, transfer, and publicly disclose personal information
(1) Sharing

1.We follow the provisions of laws and regulations and strictly restrict the sharing of information. Except for the following situations, without your consent, we will not share your personal information with any third party:

Important

text: (1), get your clear consent or authorization in advance;
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: Get your clear consent or authorization in advance may share your personal information with a third party.

text: (2) Provided according to the requirements of applicable laws and regulations, legal procedures, mandatory administrative or judicial requirements.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: Provide your personal information according to the requirements of applicable laws and regulations, legal procedures, mandatory administrative or judicial requirements.

text: 2.In order to be able to provide our services better, we may share your information with partners and other third parties to achieve the core functions you need or provide services you need, such as message push, map navigation, real -person certification, accidents, accidents, accidents, accidents, accidentsQuick claims, etc.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: May share your information from a third party to achieve the core function you need or provide the services you need.

text: But we will only share the necessary personal information and be restricted by the purpose declared in this privacy policy.
3.Realize safety and statistical analysis.
Analyze the usage of our services and enhance the experience of user use. It may be statistically data with related parties or third -party shared products (collapse, flashback).

Important

text: Remarks: Equipment information includes IMEI, Mac, Serial, SIM cards, device models, operating systems, unique device identifiers, device resolution, etc.
We will only share your information for legal, correct, necessary, specific, and clear purposes.

Important
Data Security

We will not transfer your personal information to any company, organization and individual, except the following situations: except:

Important

We will not publicly disclose the personal information collected to the outside world, and will only disclose your information only in the following situations:

text: 1.Directly related to national security and national defense security;

text: 5. How do we store and protect personal information
(1) Storage location

In accordance with the provisions of laws and regulations, we will store your personal information collected and generated during the domestic operation process in the territory of the People's Republic of China.
label: Data Retention
Important
rewrite: The personal information collected and generated in domestic operations will be stored in China.

text: (2) Storage period
Generally speaking, we only retain your information during the purpose of the purpose of the Privacy Policy and the time limit required by laws and regulations.
label: Data Retention
Important
rewrite: Generally, your personal information is retained within the time limit required to achieve service purposes, unless the law has other requirements.

text: When our products or services are stopped, we will notify you in the form of push notifications, announcements, etc., and delete or deal with your personal information within a reasonable period.
label: Important
Cessation of Operations
rewrite: When stopping operation, we will make an announcement notice and delete or processes your personal information.

text: (3) Information protection

1.In order to ensure your information security, we will adopt security protection measures that meet the industry standards, including establishing reasonable institutional specifications and security technologies to prevent your information from being accessed and modified by unauthorizeduse.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Use security measures that meet industry standards to ensure your information security.

text: 2.Network services have adopted a variety of encryption technologies, such as: encrypted transmission, information encryption storage, and strict restrictions on data centers through network security layer software (SSL).
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Network services have adopted a variety of encryption technologies.

text: 3.We only allow authorized personnel to access your information and set up strict access control and monitoring mechanisms for this.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Only authorized personnel can access your information and set up strict access to control and monitoring mechanisms for this.

text: At the same time, all personnel who may be exposed to your information fulfill the corresponding confidentiality obligations.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: All personnel who may be exposed to your information fulfill the corresponding confidentiality obligations.

text: 4.The Internet environment is not 100 % security. Please keep your login account and other identity elements.
We will adopt various security measures within a reasonable level to ensure the security of any information sent to us.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Take various security measures to ensure the security of any information sent to us.

text: 5.If the personal information security incident occurs unfortunately, we will inform you in accordance with the requirements of the laws and regulations, inform you in a timely manner, push notification, announcement and other forms: the basic situation and possible impact of security events, we have already taken the disposal measures that we are going to take,You can independently prevent and reduce risk suggestions, and remedy your remedy.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: If a personal information security incident occurs, we will inform your basic situation, possible impact, disposal measures, independent prevention suggestions, etc.

text: We will also report to the disposal of personal information security incidents in accordance with the requirements of laws and regulations and regulators.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Report the disposal of personal information security incidents in accordance with the requirements of the regulatory authorities.

text: 6. Visit and manage personal information

During your use of traffic management 12123, in order to easily inquire and manage your information, while ensuring your right to cancel your account, we provide the corresponding operation on the client. For details, you can refer to the following guidelines:
label: Edit/Control

text: (1) Manage your information

Log in to traffic management 12123 mobile client, you can enter the personal information interface by clicking on the "My" in the upper right corner of the homepage. You can view personal avatars, registration time, real -person authentication status, ID information, mobile phone number, email address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, mailing address, and mailing address,Postal code and other information, click the corresponding option to modify.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: By clicking on the "My" in the upper right corner of the 12123 mobile client, entering the personal information interface, you can view information such as personal avatars, registration time, real -person authentication status, ID card information, mobile phone number, email address, mailing address, postal code and other information, etc.Click the corresponding option to modify it.

text: For your personal information security, personal ID number and mobile phone number will be displayed.
label: Important
Data Security

The account password is the same as the login traffic management 12123 client.
After entering the homepage, you can click on the left directory to view and handle related business. Enter "user information management" to view and modify user personal information.

Edit/Control

Log in to traffic management 12123 mobile client, enter "mine", click "set" in the upper right corner, you can perform login password modification, gesture password modification, delete account number, stop account number, account migration.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: Log in to traffic management 12123 mobile client, enter "mine", click "set" in the upper right corner, you can perform login password modification, gesture password modification, delete account number, stop account number, account migration.

text: You can also access the Internet platform https://gab.122.gov.cn and select the registration of the local Internet platform. The account password is the same as the login traffic management 12123 client, enter the user information management interface, and perform the corresponding operation.

(3) When you access, modify and delete relevant information, for consideration of security and identification or in accordance with laws and regulations and regulatory regulations, we may ask you to verify your identity through mobile phone text messages or face scanning to ensure the account numberSafety.

Edit/Control

text: 1.Directly related to national security and national defense security;

Important

text: 2.Directly related to public safety, public health, and major public interests;

Edit/Control

text: 3.Directly related to criminal investigation, prosecution, trial, and execution judgment;

Edit/Control
rewrite: Your request is related to criminal investigation, prosecution, and trial, and may not be responded.

text: 4.There is sufficient evidence that you have subjective malicious or abuse of rights;

Important
rewrite: Personal information controller has sufficient evidence to indicate that the subject of personal information has subjective malice or abuse of rights, and may not respond to the request.

text: 5.Response your request will cause serious damage to the legitimate rights and interests of other individuals and organizations;
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: We may not be able to respond to the request that the legitimate rights and interests of personal information subjects or other individuals and organizations are seriously damaged.

text: 6.Involved in business secrets.

Edit/Control

text: During use, third -party service providers may collect, use and store your relevant data or information.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: Third -party service providers may collect, use and store your relevant data or information.

text: Before you decide to use this type of service, you must be constrained by the third party's own service terms and information protection statements (not this "Privacy Policy"). Please read the terms carefully.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure

text: This "Privacy Policy" is only applicable to any information we collected, and does not apply to any third -party service or third -party information use rules, and we do not responsibility for any third party's use of information.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
Risk
rewrite: We do not have any responsibility for any third party's information.

text: 8. Age restriction
We are a platform to provide comprehensive public security traffic safety services. Our services are mainly facing adults 18 years old and above.
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: Services are mainly facing adults 18 years old and over.

text: If you are a minor, you should read and decide whether to agree with your parents or other guardians under the guidance of your parents or other guardians.
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: Minors should read and decide whether to agree with the privacy policy under the guidance of the guardian.

text: We will protect personal information of minors in accordance with the requirements of relevant national laws and regulations.
9. Notification and revision
In order to provide better services, we will modify the terms of the Privacy Policy in a timely manner, which modify these part of the privacy policy.
Without your clear consent, we will not reduce the rights you should enjoy based on the current privacy policy that take effect.
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: We will not reduce the rights you should enjoy based on the current privacy policy that takes effect.

text: For major changes, we will inform you the updated content and services through the announcement of the 12123 announcement, push notification or other appropriate ways.
label: Policy Change

text: When registering as our user, you can check the latest version of "Privacy Policy", or you can view it in the traffic management 12123 client "My → Settings → About", so that you can understand the latest personal information protection policy in time.
label: Important
rewrite: When you register as our user, you can also view the latest version of "Privacy Policy" in the 12123 client "My → Settings → About".

text: 10. Contact us

(1) If you have any questions, opinions or suggestions on our personal information processing methods, or if you have any questions, opinions or suggestions on this "Privacy Policy" and your personal information, you can access https://gab.122.Gov.cn also selects the Internet platform to obtain the corresponding contact information.
label: Important
Contact Information
rewrite: You can access https://gab.122.gov.cn and select the Internet platform to obtain the corresponding contact information.

text: For areas that have opened 12123 voice services, you can dial the 12123 voice number. When you call the different place number, you need to add the area code.
label: Important
Contact Information
rewrite: You can call the 12123 voice number to contact us.

text: (2) If you have any questions, opinions or suggestions on the content of this privacy policy, you can contact us through the 12123 client "Service Center → Feedback of Opinions or Consultation".
label: Important
Contact Information
rewrite: You can contact us through traffic management 12123 client "service center → feedback or consultation telephone".
